price: Dájúdájú Allāhu ṣa Ādam, Nūh, ará ilé ’Ibrọ̄hīm àti ará ilé ‘Imrọ̄n lẹ́ṣà lórí àwọn ẹ̀dá (àsìkò tiwọn).
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ وَنُوحٗا وَءَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَءَالَ عِمۡرَٰنَ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha iṣ'ṭafā ādama wanūḥan waāla ib'rāhīma waāla ʿim'rāna ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
